news_item_1_title: Delivery of Combat Drones to Our Defenders
news_item_1_text: Today, together with partners and everyone who contributed to the fundraiser, we delivered combat drones to our defenders. Each drone means saved lives and brings us closer to victory.
news_item_2_title: Assistance for the “Bratstvo” Unit of the Defence Intelligence
news_item_2_text: Today we delivered humanitarian aid to the Defence Intelligence’s “Bratstvo” unit. Thanks to your support, we purchased and delivered EcoFlow power stations, Starlink kits to improve communications, and a camouflage net for additional protection. Thank you to everyone who contributed.
about_text_1: The Public Union “Association of Volunteer Teams of Ukraine” is a community that brings together NGOs, volunteer teams, and individual volunteers.
about_text_2: The main goal of AVKU is to unite efforts and cooperation to strengthen the volunteer movement, provide meaningful support to the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and help people affected by the war.
about_text_3: Mutual support among volunteers of all generations is a daily step toward victory and the post-war recovery of Ukraine.
about_text_4: AVKU was founded on many years of active volunteer work by individuals and civic organizations that have been helping Ukraine since the beginning of Russia’s aggression in 2014.
